countries.name: Australia
countries.language_requirements: IELTS 6.0 overall (minimum 5.5 in each band) or equivalent PTE/TOEFL score
countries.financial_requirements: AUD 24,505 per year for living costs + course fees + health insurance
countries.work_permission: Up to 48 hours per fortnight during term, unlimited during breaks
countries.cost_of_living: AUD 1,500-2,500 per month depending on city
student_benefits: Access to Medicare for some students

countries.name: Canada
countries.language_requirements: IELTS 6.5 overall or equivalent TOEFL/PTE. Some French programs require TEF/TCF
countries.financial_requirements: CAD 10,000-15,000 for living expenses + tuition fees. Proof of funds required
document_checklist: Proof of ties to home country
countries.health_insurance: Provincial health coverage in some provinces, private insurance recommended
countries.work_permission: 20 hours/week during sessions, full-time during scheduled breaks
student_benefits: Post-Graduation Work Permit (PGWP) up to 3 years
Spouse can get open work permit

countries.name: Germany
countries.language_requirements: TestDaF or DSH for German programs. IELTS/TOEFL for English programs
countries.financial_requirements: EUR 11,208 in blocked account OR scholarship proof OR parent declaration
countries.health_insurance: Statutory or private health insurance mandatory (approx EUR 110/month)
countries.work_permission: 120 full days or 240 half days per year
student_benefits: Free or very low tuition at public universities

countries.name: United Kingdom
countries.language_requirements: IELTS UKVI 5.5-7.0 depending on course level
countries.health_insurance: Immigration Health Surcharge (IHS) provides NHS access
countries.work_permission: 20 hours/week during term, full-time during vacations

countries.name: Japan
countries.language_requirements: JLPT N2 for Japanese programs, IELTS/TOEFL for English programs
countries.financial_requirements: JPY 2,000,000 in bank account OR scholarship/sponsor letter
countries.health_insurance: National Health Insurance (NHI) mandatory, approx JPY 20,000/year
